official_title: A bill to provide that operators of commercial motor vehicles who are licensed under State law need not meet requirements of Federal law which establish standards for eyesight as a qualification for operation of such a vehicle.

summary.text: Declares that operators of commercial motor vehicles licensed under State law need not meet Federal standards for eyesight as a qualification for operation of such vehicles.

titles.title: A bill to provide that operators of commercial motor vehicles who are licensed under State law need not meet requirements of Federal law which establish standards for eyesight as a qualification for operation of such a vehicle.
